REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1337 reute h f BC-ALLWASTE-<ALWS>-TO-AC 04-03 0045

TEXT.TITLE: ALLWASTE <ALWS> TO ACQUIRE SERVICE FIRM
TEXT.BODY: Allwaste Inc said it agreed in principle to acquire all outstanding stock of a company in the industrial service business for 1.98 mln dlrs in common stock. It did not identify the company to be acquired. Reuter
